name: Formatted Platformer Time
description: Sets the platformer time to HH:MM:SS:ss format

show-all.name: Show All Zeros
show-all.description:
All unused slots in the timer will be filled with zeros.

For example, a time of <cg>1:09</c> will display as <cg>0:01:09.00</c>.

rainbow-speed.name: Hue Shift Speed
rainbow-speed.description:
Changes the hue shift speed of the rainbow timer.

<cg>Lower values = Faster hue shifts</c>
